    FOKUS questionnaire schema

Read in generated survey data

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
read_survey_data.Rd

Reads in the FOKUS survey data generated by export_survey_data() for the specified ballot date in the specified canton and the specified language.

Usage

read_survey_data(
  ballot_date = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "ballot_date", pkg = this_pkg),
  canton = cantons(ballot_date),
  lang = all_langs
)

Arguments

ballot_date

FOKUS-covered ballot date. One of

  • "2018-09-23"

  • "2018-11-25"

  • "2019-10-20"

  • "2020-09-27"

  • "2020-10-18"

  • "2021-11-28"

  • "2023-06-18"

canton

FOKUS-covered canton name. One of

  • "aargau"

lang

Language. One of "de" or "en".

Value

A tibble.

See also

Other data import functions: read_easyvote_municipalities(), read_online_participation_codes(), read_private_file(), read_voting_register_data_extra(), read_voting_register_ids()

Examples

# GitLab PAT with access to the private FOKUS repository is required for this function to work
try(
  fokus::read_survey_data(ballot_date = "2023-06-18",
                          canton = "aargau",
                          lang = "en")
)
